messages.nopermit: You are not allowed to use that command. Log-in into RCON account.
messages.editorinuse: Editor is being used by another player.
messages.infoeditorlocked: Script has been blocked. #nCheck server LOGs for more informations.
messages.infoprojectexported: The project has been successfully exported. #nProject exported to #1
messages.infoparamnamechange: The variable name has been changed.#nNew variable name: #1#nTextDraw text: #2
messages.infoparamnamechangetaken: This variable name has already been used.
messages.infoparamnamechangecharserr: Variable names cannot contain special characters or spaces.
messages.infomaxtextdrawsreached: The maximum number of textdraws has been reached.
messages.infoprojectlimit: The maximum number of projects has been reached.
messages.infoprojectinvalidname: The name is too short, too long or has invalid characters.
messages.infoprojectclosed: The project has been successfully saved and closed.
messages.infoprojectsaveerror: An error occurred while saving the project.
messages.projectrenamed: The project name has been successfully changed. #nOld project name:"#1"#nNew project name: "#2
messages.projectnamechangecharerr: The name is too short, too long or has invalid characters.
messages.projectnamechangeerror: An error occurred while renaming the project.
messages.projectloaderror: An error occurred while loading the project.
messages.projectdeleteerror: An error occurred while deleting the project.
messages.infoprojectconverted: Project has been converted.#nAmount of converted TextDraws: #1
messages.infoprojecterror: An error occured while converting the project.
messages.infomaxgroupsreached: The maximum number of groups has been reached.
messages.infogroupexists: Group with that name already exists.
messages.tdeditdeclinedhidden: You can't edit this Textdraw because the group this textdraw belongs in is hidden.#nPlease change the visibility of the group named: #1

spritechange.caption: Sprite change
spritechange.info0: Enter the library name and sprite name.

oldversionsettingsreset.caption: Another version detected
oldversionsettingsreset.info0: The script version differs from the configuration file version.
oldversionsettingsreset.info1: Would you like to restore the settings so that the script can work properly?

settingsreset.caption: Restoring default settings
settingsreset.info0: Are you sure you want to restore the default settings?

newproject.caption: New project
newproject.info0: Enter the name of new project.

exitconfirmation.caption: Exit
exitconfirmation.info0: Are you sure you want to exit the editor?
exitconfirmation.info1: Open projects will be automatically saved.

previewmodelid.caption: Model Preview
previewmodelid.info0: Enter the character model ID, vehicle model or object model.

variablechange.caption: Change variable name
variablechange.info1: Leave blank to delete custom name

colorchange.caption: Color change
colorchange.info0: Provide Color in the given formats:

deletedconfirm.caption: Deleting
deletedconfirm.info0: Are you sure you want to delete this TextDraw?

textchange.caption: Change text
textchange.info0: Enter the text to be set

deleteprojectconfirm.caption: Deleting
deleteprojectconfirm.info0: Are you sure you want to delete this project?

changeprojectname.caption: Change project name
changeprojectname.info0: Enter new name of the project.

exportwitharray.caption: Project export
exportwitharray.info0: Would you like to export this project with array mode enabled?
exportwitharray.info1: Textdraws with the default variable name will be added to the array to reduce the amount of code.

manualchangemessage.caption: Manual change of value
manualchangemessage.info0: Enter a new value for #1#nCurrent value: #2

barmaxpercentagechange.caption: Change max. Progress bar value
barmaxpercentagechange.info0: Enter a new value for the maximum value of the progress bar.

infoprojectneedconvert.caption: Convert project
infoprojectneedconvert.info0: This project file need to be converted in order to work within this editor.
infoprojectneedconvert.info2: The original file will be placed inside #3
infoprojectneedconvert.info3: Do you want to proceed with the conversion?

newgroup.caption: New group
newgroup.info0: Enter the name of new group.

grouprename.caption: Change group name
grouprename.info0: Enter new name of the group.

groupdelete.caption: Deleting group
groupdelete.info0: Are you sure you want to delete this group?
groupdelete.info1: This action only deletes the group, not the TextDraws inside.
